Class tripleplay.ui.Background

Removed Methods
float height() Returns this background's adjustment to an element's height.
float width() Returns this background's adjustment to an element's width.
 

Added Methods
Background croppedImage(Image) Creates a cropped centered image background with the specified image.
Background insets(Insets) Configures insets on this background.
 

Removed Fields
float bottom The insets of this background.
float left The insets of this background.
float right The insets of this background.
float top The insets of this background.
 

Added Fields
Insets insets The insets of this background, added to get the overall Element size.
